QuestData.Title: Faith Through the Darkness
QuestData.Description:
This drought is... so much larger than I imagined.
Why did nobody tell us?
The burden of this knowledge weighs heavy... do we bear souls to their eternal torture?
We must return home.
QuestData.LogDescription: Return to Adrestes in Elysian Hold.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Return to Adrestes in Elysian Hold.
